products.name: Gerber Cereal for Baby 1st Foods Oatmeal Single Grain Cereal

extendedInfo.detail: 11 grams of whole grains per serving. 60% DV of iron for learning ability.  Halal.  Non GMO Project Verified. nongmoproject.org.   Grain & grow. No.1 pediatricians recommended brand (Among pediatricians who recommended infant cereal) for infant cereals. Supported sitter. 1st Food. Grain & grow brings the goodness of whole grains and tailored nutrition. Iron to support learning ability. Gerber combines high quality wholegrain goodness with 12 essential nutrients. Supported Sitter: Your baby may be ready for this cereal if they: Sit with support. On tummy, push up arms with straight elbows. Lean towards spoon with an open mouth. Baby's first cereal. This package is sold by weight, not volume, and may not appear full due to setting of contents. Every bite counts! Learn More.  Visit Gerber.com to chat with MyGerber Baby Expert 1-800-4-GERBER 24/7.  We take action to protect the planet - so Gerber babies will grow and thrive for generations to come. Visit Gerber.com/sustainability to learn more. Terracycle.com.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Whole Grain Oat Flour And Oat Flour (Contains Wheat), Potassium Phosphate, Vitamins And Minerals: Calcium Carbonate, Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Iron (Electrolytic), Zinc, Sulfate, Vitamin E (Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate), Niacinamide, Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin), Vitamin B1 (Thiamin Mononitrate), Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine Hydrochloride), Folic Acid, Vitamin B12.
extendedInfo.directions: Easy-to-Mix Directions: 1 Pour desired amount of cereal bowl. 2 Stir in liquid (breastmilk or infant formula) to desired consistency. Serve as is or warm in the microwave. Always test temperature before feeding. Discard any unfed cereal. Mix 1 tbsp. cereal with 4-5 tbsp. of breastmilk or infant formula. Microwave: Microwave Guidelines for Heating: Warm unheated liquid at medium (50% power) for 15-30 seconds. Mix heated liquid with cereal Stir to even out temperature. Test Temperature before feeding.  Store in a cool, dry place.  Twist cap off, remove seal & twist back on.  Use within 30 days after opening.
extendedInfo.warnings: Contains: wheat.Do not use if seal is damaged. Keep package away from children. Keep container dry.
